pages.text: A $(l)diamond$() is a rare mineral obtained from $(l:building/diamond_ore)diamond ore$() or loot chests. $(br2)They are mainly used to craft high-tier $(l:tools/tool)tools$() and $(l:combat/armors/armor)armor$(), $(l:building/enchanting_table)enchanting tables$(), $(l:building/diamond_block)blocks of diamond$(), and $(l:utility/jukebox)jukeboxes$().

pages.title: Diamonds!
pages.text: Acquire diamonds . $(br2)Have a diamond in your inventory.
